name: 19.9h

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), w0)
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))

comment: A wff may be existentially quantified with a variable not free in it. Theorem 19.9 of [Margaris] p. 89. (Contributed by FL, 24-Mar-2007.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 5-Jan-2018.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 14-Jul-2020.)
